sentences.sentence: Repetitive, mindless factory labor replaced working holistically with nature.
sentences.translation: 工厂的劳动大众重复劳作，他们取代了同大自然共同劳作的农民。

sentences.sentence: For example, we can develop a new project at work or re-organize our life holistically.
sentences.translation: 例如，在工作中我们可以整体的开发一个新项目或者全面重新规划我们自己的生活。

sentences.sentence: This lets us see more of the whole picture, look at problems more holistically, and take corrective action sooner.
sentences.translation: 这使得我们可以看到更多的整体画面，更轻松地查看问题，更快地采取适当的行动。
